feat.title: Ancestral Wrath
feat.benefit: While you are bloodied, you gain a +1 bonus to speed. This increases to a +2 bonus when you charge.

feat.title: Bolstering Inspiration
feat.benefit: If an ally is adjacent to you when he or she uses your draw inspiration class power, you can take a free interrupt to either increase the healing by your Wisdom modifier or to allow the ally to make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end.
The increased healing becomes 4 + your Wisdom modifier at 11th level, and 8 + your Wisdom modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Cast Iron Font
feat.benefit: When you succeed at a saving throw against a Poison effect at the start of your turn, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.
These temporary hit points increase to 3 + your Constitution modifier at 11th level, and to 6 + your Constitution modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Delzoun Trueborn
feat.benefit: Whenever you use your Stand Your Ground racial trait to avoid falling prone, you roll twice on the saving throw and can use either result.
feat.special: You are considered to be a member of the lost kingdom of Delzoun for the purposes of all magic effects, items, and treatises that depend upon that distinction.

feat.title: Devoted Enforcement
feat.benefit: When you make a melee basic attack as part of enforce challenge, you deal additional damage equal to your Wisdom modifier. If you are not a dwarf, you must be wielding a shield to gain this benefit.
This additional damage increases to 3 + your Wisdom modifier at 11th level, and to 6 + your Wisdom modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Dodge Giants
feat.benefit: You gain a +1 bonus to AC and Reflex against attacks of Large or larger foes.

feat.title: Dwarf Battle Priest
feat.benefit: When you use your healing word class power on an ally, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.
These temporary hit points increase to 4 + your Constitution modifier at 11th level, and to 8 + your Constitution modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Dwarf Stoneblood
feat.benefit: Your number of healing surges increases by one.
Also, the number of temporary hit points you gain from Fighter powers increases by 2.
These additional temporary hit points increase to 4 at 11th level, and to 6 at 21st level.

feat.title: Dwarf Trapsmith
feat.benefit: You gain a +4 feat bonus to Perception checks to find traps, and to Thievery checks to open locks and to disable traps.

feat.title: Dwarven Durability
feat.benefit: Your number of healing surges increases by two.
Also, your healing surge value increases by your Constitution modifier.
Starting at 21st level, your number of healing surges increases by three instead.

feat.title: Dwarven Recovery
feat.benefit: When you use your second wind, you gain a +5 bonus to saving throws until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Dwarven Rejuvenation
feat.benefit: When an ally gains temporary hit points due to your Arcane Rejuvenation class feature, that ally also gains a +2 bonus to all defenses until the start of his or her next turn.

feat.title: Dwarven Stalwart
feat.benefit: At the start of your turn, you gain a +1 feat bonus to attack rolls using Axes and Hammers. This bonus lasts until you move or are moved.

feat.title: Dwarven Weapon Training
feat.benefit: You gain proficiency with all Axes and Hammers.
Also, you gain a +2 feat bonus to Weapon damage rolls with Axes and Hammers.
This bonus to damage rolls increases to +3 at 11th level, and to +4 at 21st level.

feat.title: Enduring Wallop
feat.benefit: When you wield an Axe, a hammer, a mace, or a pick and hit an enemy with a Fighter daily attack power, that enemy takes ongoing damage equal to your Constitution modifier (save ends).
This ongoing damage increases to 5 + your Constitution modifier at 21st level.
If the daily attack power already deals ongoing damage that has no damage type, you instead increase that ongoing damage by an amount equal to your Constitution modifier.

feat.title: Forgeborn Heritage
feat.benefit: You gain resist 2 acid, resist 2 cold, resist 2 fire, resist 2 lightning, and resist 2 thunder.
These resists increase to 4 at 11th level, and to 8 at 21st level.
Also, you gain the elemental legacy bloodline power.

power.title: Elemental Legacy
power.fluff: You allow the elemental energy in your soul to swell forth and scour your foes
power.keyword: Elemental; Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning or Thunder

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You hit an enemy with an attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The triggering enemy takes 3 extra acid, cold, fire, lightning or thunder damage.

feat.title: Foulborn Heritage
feat.benefit: You are a foulborn.
Your origin changes to aberrant instead of natural.
Also, you have the unbalanced mind power.

power.title: Unbalanced Mind
power.fluff: Your connection to the Far Realm unleashes psychic pain in response to attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you have an Aura 1 (Psionic, Psychic).
Any creature that enters the aura or ends its turn there takes 5 psychic damage. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

feat.title: Gold Dwarf Pride
feat.benefit: If you are reduced to 0 hit points or fewer and return to consciousness in the same encounter, you gain a cumulative +1 bonus to AC and attack rolls until the end of the encounter.

feat.title: Grudge Style
feat.benefit: When an enemy damages you, you gain the following benefits until the end of your next turn:
Your melee martial at-will attacks deal additional damage against that enemy equal to one-half your Wisdom modifier (minimum +1 bonus).
Your triggered attacks against that enemy, including reactive strikes, deal additional damage equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum +2).

feat.title: Improved Legacy
feat.benefit: The extra damage dealt by your elemental legacy bloodline power increases by 4.
Starting at 21st level, the extra damage increases by 6 instead.

feat.title: Iron Hide Resilience
feat.benefit: You increase the resists you gain from Forgeborn Heritage to 5.
This resistance increases to 10 at 11th level, and to 15 at 21st level.

feat.title: Keen Hatred
feat.benefit: When you use your elemental legacy bloodline power, you also gain a +2 bonus to the first attack roll you make before the end of your next turn.

catalog.feat: Knock Back Heroic Dwarf Stand Your Ground Condition Infliction Racial Triggered When you succeed on a saving throw to avoid being knocked prone, you can use a free reaction to knock prone one enemy of size Medium or smaller that is adjacent to you. Starting at 11th level, you can knock prone a creature of size Large or smaller.>

feat.title: Obsidian Cave Recovery
feat.benefit: When you use your second wind on your turn, you regain the use of the power you gained from your Infused Form class feature if you have already used it during this encounter.

feat.title: Poison Plague Feast
feat.benefit: Whenever you successfully save against a Poison effect, you gain temporary hit points equal to 1 + one-half your level.
If you have the Student of the Plague feat, you also gain a +2 bonus to saving throws until the end of your next turn in addition to the temporary hit points.

feat.title: Resilience of Stone
feat.benefit: You can use your second wind as an immediate interrupt with the following trigger:
You take damage.

feat.title: Rune-scribed Soul
feat.benefit: When you use your second wind, you gain a bonus to damage rolls with arcane attack powers equal to your Constitution modifier until the end of your current turn.

feat.title: Shield the Fallen
feat.benefit: When you are adjacent to a bloodied, unconscious, or helpless ally, that ally gains a +1 bonus to saving throws and all defenses. This bonus does not stack if the ally is adjacent to more than one character with this feat.
This increases to a +2 bonus if you are using a shield you have proficiency with.

feat.title: Shifting Stone
feat.benefit: When you succeed in a saving throw to avoid being knocked prone, you can shift a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier as a free reaction.

feat.title: Solid Footing
feat.benefit: You gain the Earth Walk ability, allowing you to ignore difficult terrain that is the result of rubble, uneven stone, or earthen construction such as stairs.

feat.title: Spirits of Stone
feat.benefit: When you use your second wind, you gain a +2 bonus to the first attack roll you make with a primal attack before the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Steadfast Inspiration
feat.benefit: When an ally uses your draw inspiration class power, that character can reduce any pull, push, or slide against him or her by 1 square until the end of the encounter. A dwarven ally with the Standard Your Ground racial trait increases the reduction from that trait by 1 square instead.

feat.title: Stone Cunning
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to Dungeoneering checks.
Also, you gain a +2 bonus to any checks to detect a trap, a hazard, or a secret door.

feat.title: Stone Step Spirits
feat.benefit: While you're not wearing heavy armor, you can ignore the first square of difficult terrain when you move, or all difficult terrain when you move as part of a charge.
This increases to ignore the first 2 squares of difficult terrain when you move at 21st level.

feat.title: Stonefoot Reprisal
feat.benefit: Enemies that push or slide you trigger reactive strikes from you. If your attack hits, you can choose to negate the triggering forced movement.

feat.title: Stoneheart Warrior
feat.benefit: You can use your second wind as a free action.

feat.title: Stubborn Spirit
feat.benefit: You can use the following action at-will:
An ally adjacent to your spirit companion is pushed, pulled, or slidYou reduce the forced movement by a number equal to one-half your Constitution modifier.

feat.title: Thundertusk Companion
feat.benefit: Your beast companion gains additional hit points equal to 5 or your level, whichever is higher.

feat.title: Tunnel Stalker
feat.benefit: You can use any one-handed Axe, one-handed Hammer, or one-handed Pick with rogue powers that require a Light Blade.
Also, you can deal Sneak Attack damage with any one-handed Axe, one-handed Hammer, or one-handed Pick. When you do, you deal +1 damage.
This damage increases to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level.

feat.title: Unstoppable Drive
feat.benefit: When you use your second wind, you can shift 1 square as a free reaction. You must end this movement in a space adjacent to at least one enemy.
This increases to shift up to 2 squares at 21st level.

feat.title: Wrath of Ages Past
feat.benefit: When you use your armor of wrath Channel Divinity power against an enemy larger than you, add your Wisdom modifier to the damage dealt by the power.
This additional damage increases to 3 + your Wisdom modifier at 11th level, and to 6 + your Wisdom modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Wrathful Legacy
feat.benefit: The first time in an encounter that you are bloodied, you regain the use of your elemental legacy power.

feat.title: Wrathful Resurgence
feat.benefit: When you use your second wind, you also gain temporary hit points equal to one-half your healing surge value.
